skillsSection.subtitle: About Us
skillsSection.title: Enhance Your Skills With TechHub
skillsSection.description: TechHub is a leading online learning platform, providing high-quality courses on technology, programming, and software development. We are committed to delivering the best learning experience for our students.
skillsSection.feature1Description: Our team of experienced instructors comes from top technology companies, ready to share knowledge and guide you.
skillsSection.feature2Description: Access courses 24/7 on any device. Learn at your own pace with continuously updated content.

community.title: Creating A Community Of Life Long Learners.

step1.title: Hello! ðŸ‘‹
step1.content: Hi there! I'm Miu - your guide at TechHub. I'll take you on a tour and help you understand TechHub better. Let's go!

step2.title: Learning Area ðŸ“º
step2.content: This is the central area of the screen, all lesson content like videos, images, and text will be displayed here {userName} ^^

step3.title: Lesson List ðŸ“š
step3.content: Next is an equally important area, this is the list of lessons in this course. You'll interact here frequently to switch lessons and do exercises >_<

step4.title: First Lesson âœ…
step4.content: This is your first lesson, when you complete this lesson I'll mark it with a "Green Checkmark" to indicate you've finished it!

step5.title: Locked Lesson ðŸ”’
step5.content: This is lesson 2, by default all lessons at TechHub are locked. When you complete the previous lesson, the next one will automatically unlock. Don't skip the video during learning, or it won't count as completed ^^

step6.title: Notes & Discussion ðŸ“
step6.content: TechHub has a very special feature, which is the "Create Note" function. When studying there will be times you want to take notes, at TechHub you won't need paper and ink for this. Give it a heart <3

step7.title: Q&A Area ðŸ’¬
step7.content: And this is the area for Q&A and discussion in each lesson. If you find a lesson interesting, feel free to leave a word of encouragement here. I'll be very happy and grateful <3

step1.title: Welcome to AI Chat! ðŸ¤–
step1.content: Hello {userName}! I'm TechHub's AI assistant. Let me show you how to use this AI chat page. Let's get started!

step2.title: Chat Mode ðŸŽ¯
step2.content: This is where you select the chat mode. There are 2 modes: "General Q&A" to ask anything, and "Learning Advisor" to get AI suggestions for learning paths and courses that suit you!

step3.title: Message Input ðŸ’¬
step3.content: This is where you type your questions for the AI. Feel free to ask anything about programming, courses, or learning paths. The AI will respond instantly!

step4.title: Suggested Questions âš¡
step4.content: If you don't know what to ask, here are some sample questions I suggest for you. Just click on one and it will be sent right away!

step5.title: Conversation History ðŸ“š
step5.content: All your conversations will be saved here. You can come back to view them anytime, very convenient right!

step6.title: Create New Chat âœ¨
step6.content: When you want to start a new topic, click this button to create a new conversation. Have fun chatting with the AI! ðŸ’•

AboutPage.heroDescription: Empowering learners worldwide with quality education and cutting-edge technology
AboutPage.goalDescription: World-class training and development programs developed by top teachers. Build skills with courses, certificates, and degrees online from world-class.
AboutPage.missionDescription: At TechHub, we believe that education should be accessible to everyone, everywhere. Our mission is to provide high-quality, affordable learning experiences that empower individuals to achieve their goals and transform their lives.
AboutPage.mission1: Deliver world-class educational content from industry experts
AboutPage.mission2: Foster a global community of lifelong learners
AboutPage.mission3: Provide flexible learning paths for diverse skill levels
AboutPage.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of students already learning on TechHub
